title: New: Merchandise- Begging for Your Life/In The City Light
content:
Following on from the excellent ‘Children of Desire’ and last year’s ‘Total Nite’, Tampa band Merchandise have announced that their next album will be released on 4AD, which seems like a match made in heaven.

Merchandise are also streaming their next single, ‘Begging for Your Life/In The City Light’ in advance of a release on limited run of 12″ vinyls on February 24th. The track echoes everything great about Merchandise’s previous records, particularly Carson Cox’s unmistakable vocals. It does however, takes a more laid back approach to previous songs which have felt rooted in punk music. This track features echoes of saxophones, giving the track an almost jazz-like feel about it. 2014 is going to be a big year for this band.

Check out the 4AD website for more.
